Author: j4jackj
Text: perhaps bring in a lunchbox of deli meats and cheese, if you don't want to eat the cafeteria lunch?  please don't say these things (that you are a shit person, or whatever) about yourself. they are false or at the very least highly misleading.  you seem like you care but just don't know how to broach the subj with him. Shame there's not an /r/Eat-Anon - think you'd want to start it?

Author: Aleph0-4
Text: it's possible he's triggered by your habits but that doesn't make it your fault. you're not an awful person and it's clear you really care about him.  i don't think isolating yourself is gonna help- you might be one of the only people in his life who understands what he's going through.
